<:WTT:711683426469544006> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡² Want an EZ Flash GBA Cart, want to trade Original Oracle of Ages cart.

<:WTB:708489317357584415> ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º 
Since Bluish Squirrel is still offline, I'm looking for one or two sets of white holo stickers for the GBA - see: https://i.imgur.com/tk0LxoS.png.
So, if you got some left from Bluish and are willing to sell them or know a shop that provides similar quality as Bluish, hit me up.
<:WTS:708489317168971778> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ Toki Tori, GBC - $45 shipped, new save battery

<:WTS:708489317168971778> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ 

DMG - $40: Still dirty. No sound, corroded battery contacts. Honestly just no time to fix. 

Modded MGB - $100: New blank FP shell. Glass screen lens. HISPEEDIDO IPS LCD. New membranes and buttons. Motherboard fully cleaned. OEM caps. 

Modded CGB - $120: FP white shell. New membranes and buttons. Glass screen lens. Unbranded Q5 IPS LCD. Motherboard fully cleaned.  OEM caps. 

Modded AGB - $150: FP shell, and buttons. Glass screen lens. Unbranded IPS LCD v2. Motherboard fully cleaned. OEM caps.

<:WTS:708489317168971778> **Various Refurbished GameBoys** [UK, worldwide shipping]

**-IPS modded Game Boy Light** - Â£155 - I have several of each shell (except the blue) and a variety of buttons and lenses (including the Pikachu lens) so I'm also happy to make changes to any of them if you'd prefer a different design.

**-Slate SP** - Gold faceplate, black back, aluminum buttons. Â£300. Comes with the Makho battery. This console has only been used for around 4 hours but I can put new tact switches on if needed.

**-IPS modded GBP** (ice blue shell, white buttons, famitsu lens) - Â£115. It has a power cleaner mod which seemed necessary to make the screen work with the AAA batteries. If you don't like the shell or buttons, I'm happy to swap for something else if I have it.

**-IPS modded GBC**(white shell with extremerate chameleon buttons) - Â£140 - again I have other shells/buttons if you don't like this one.

**-Stock GBC** - Â£60 - no mods, but they will be thoroughly cleaned and if you want I can replace the stock lens with a new glass one.


--------

I checked ebay and etsy for the prices of some of these, and where I couldnt find good sold examples I just went by how much it cost to build - so if I'm way off PLEASE let me know.

Postage - I'm willing to post worldwide. I'm also willing to go half on the price of postage as long as it's not crazy.

<:WTS:708489317168971778> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ WTS some MGB's that came from a Japan lot. Selling them as-is. From putting batteries and powering on:

#7 - Powered on, screen burnt in.

#9 - Powered on, screen burnt in, speaker is choppy.

#11 - Powered on, screen burnt in. Speaker quiet at max volume.

#13 - Powers on, but has dead pixels in the center. Has some weird hardened white gunk on the exterior back? I took a few passes at cleaning it, but looks/feels like hardened lotion. Very odd.

~~#14 - Turns on, works like a normal MGB. The backplate is green, and the glass screen has lost all adhesiveness.~~ SOLD

#18 - Powers on, screen burnt in. I think someone fingerpainted on the glass as well?

#23 - Powers on, screen burnt in.

#26 - Powers on, screen burnt in. Noticed a little corrosion on the battery terminals on the shell side. No backplate.

~~#27 - Powers on  most of the time. May need some cleaning. No backplate.~~ SOLD

~~#29 -  Fully functional. Covered in dragonquest stickers, if you're into that. *on hold*~~ SOLD

Happy to go into more details of these over DM's - Asking $30 + shipping per. I may also have some spare parts, just ask.

<:WTS:708489317168971778> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ WTS (Games Pictured Below)
 2x Authentic Pokemon Emerald NEW panasonic battery
- Authentic Pokemon Fire Red 
- Authentic Pokemon White
- Authentic Pokemon Moon
- IPS V2 modded GBA Emerald theme (msg for pics)
- XBOX One, 360 & 360 Slim & controllers
- GBA & SP parts including IPS screens & lenses, OEM screens, shells, buttons, speakers, etc. lmk what you need.


<:WTB:708489317357584415> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ WTB
- Slate shell & display
- Gameboy Advance / working motherboard
- PS3 phat memory card door
- PS3 phat (broken / working)
- NES shell / top shell / cart slot door
- NES (broken / working)
- NES controllers (NES-004)
- Wii remote plus
- PS3 Super Slim
- Any clear Nintendo controllers 

I typically base my prices off of pricecharting. Open to bundles, feel free to PM.
